LegislativeIntro:
TK - Explain how legislative r

In each even-year election, Montanans elect 100 state representatives to two-year terms and 25 of 50 state senators to four-year terms. In 2022, one additional senate seat that would otherwise be out of cycle (district XXX; confirm) is also on the ballot to fill a vacancy.
